title: No popup menu displayed when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler in the Java editor (Photon)
description: In the Java editor, when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler, the expected behavior is for a popup menu to appear. However, in the current version (Photon), this does not happen.
OB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler

There is no popup menu displayed to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB:
When performing the following steps:
1) Open a Java editor
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler

A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
SR:
1) Open a Java editor.
2) Right-click on the left vertical ruler.
